product_name: Burton Chopper Star Wars Snowboard - Boys'
long_description: The Burton Chopper Star Wars(TM) snowboard for boys features an exclusive Star Wars graphic he'll love, and is built to help him improve and progress on the hill. May the force be with him. Easy Rider(TM) edge tune features beveled, catch-free edges that encourage progression; Flat Top profile features a flat profile between feet for stabiliy and balance. More than just a mellow version of other kids' snowboards, the Chopper features a less dramatic sidecut and a mellow camber and edge tune. Twin shape and twin flex: this board is symmetrical from tip to tail for a balanced ride that's equally versatile whether ridden regular or switch. Tip-to-tail wood core is durable and provides a forgiving flex for edge control and solid turns. Fiberglass construction provides torsional forgiveness, board feel and edge hold, perfect for advancing to the next level. Burton Chopper Star Wars snowboard has an easy-to-maintain extruded base to keep kids moving fast in all conditions. .
